name: @rinshari/sss
description: Composable policy engine and CLI for AI-influenced review detection and blocking.

scripts.security:scorecard: npm run build && node dist/scripts/evaluate-scorecard.js --config config/security-gates.json
scripts.policy-bundle:create: npm run build && node dist/scripts/policy-bundle.js create
scripts.policy-bundle:sign: npm run build && node dist/scripts/policy-bundle.js sign
scripts.policy-bundle:sign-keyless: npm run build && node dist/scripts/policy-bundle.js sign-keyless
scripts.policy-bundle:verify: npm run build && node dist/scripts/policy-bundle.js verify
scripts.trust:lint: npm run build && node dist/scripts/policy-trust-store.js lint
scripts.trust:rotate-rsa: npm run build && node dist/scripts/policy-trust-store.js rotate-rsa
scripts.trust:revoke: npm run build && node dist/scripts/policy-trust-store.js revoke
scripts.release:verify: npm run check && npm run conformance && npm run test:provider-contract && npm run provider-fixtures:bundle && npm run trust:lint -- --trust-store config/policy-trust-store.sample.json --format json && npm run trust:lint -- --trust-store config/policy-trust-store.v2.sample.json --format json && npm run soak:rc -- --iterations 3 --report .seven-shadow/release/rc-soak.json
scripts.release:rc:prepare: npm run release:verify && npm run sbom:generate -- --output sbom.cdx.json
scripts.check: npm run test && npm run validate:schemas && npm run validate:security-gates
scripts.sentinel:comments: npm run build && node dist/src/cli.js comments
scripts.sentinel:failures: npm run build && node dist/src/cli.js failures
scripts.sentinel:lint: npm run build && node dist/src/cli.js lint
scripts.sentinel:test-quality: npm run build && node dist/src/cli.js test-quality
scripts.sentinel:patterns: npm run build && node dist/src/cli.js patterns
scripts.sentinel:inbox: npm run build && node dist/src/cli.js inbox
scripts.sentinel:score: npm run build && node dist/src/cli.js score
scripts.sentinel:digest: npm run build && node dist/src/cli.js digest
scripts.guard:seven-shadow: npm run build && node dist/src/sevenShadowSystem.js --policy config/seven-shadow-system.policy.json
